oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Gallica est la bibliothÃ¨que numÃ©rique de la BibliothÃ¨que nationale de France (BnF), disponible Ã tous depuis 1997. Cette collection tient lieu d'encyclopÃ©die numÃ©rique, regroupant des documents imprimÃ©s (livres, revues, journaux, partitions musicales etc.) aussi bien que des images (estampes, cartes, photographies etc.) et des enregistrements sonores. Gallica permet de trouver des sources rares, originales, Ã©puisÃ©es ou simplement difficiles d'accÃ¨s. Ces documents sont libres de droit pour un usage strictement privÃ©. Actuellement, la bibliothÃ¨que numÃ©rique contient plus de 70 000 volumes de textes imprimÃ©s, de 80 000 images fixes, et 30 heures d'enregistrements sonores. Pour en savoir plus : http://gallica.bnf.fr

Gallica is the digital library of the BibliothÃ¨que Nationale de France (BnF), open to the general public around the world since 1997. It serves as a digital encyclopedia and consists of printed materials (books, journals, newspapers, printed music, and other documents), graphic materials (engravings, maps, photographs, and others), and sound recordings. Gallica makes it possible to find sources that are rare, unusual, out-of-print, or difficult, if not impossible, to access. These materials are royalty-free and available free of charge when used strictly for private purposes. Today, this digital library includes more than 70,000 volumes of digitized texts, 80,000 still images, and 30 hours of sound recordings. More information at http://www.bnf.fr/pages/zNavigat/frame/version_anglaise.htm?ancre=english.htm
